title: Fast WSP Loss Implementation (5s)
description: The M5 competition loss is a little ugly, epecially when it comes to the Uncertainty's one with it's WSPL! So far, there is no, if not little, public implementation of that beast (I still talking about the WSPL and not the american  crime drama series). As I was saying it on M5  Accuracy my implementation is based on a deep inspection of the loss combined with an intelligent choice of pandas' components. Too much talk, let's dive in it !
description_lemmatized: m5 competition loss little ugly epecially come uncertainty one wspl far little public implementation beast still talking wspl american crime drama series saying m5 accuracy implementation based deep inspection loss combined intelligent choice panda component much talk let dive
